summary: When Emma moves in with her estranged, gay son, the pair must learn to reconnect through food where words fail, and face the foreclosure of the family's Chinese restaurant and a stubborn fear of intimacy.
cast: Sharon Omi|Edward Chen|Nicole Sullivan|Aidan Bristow|George Takei|Jamila Alina|Ken Narasaki|Burt Grinstead|Scott Keiji Takeda|Sam Gibney|Chris Moseman|Carlos Naranjo|Art Andranikyan|Lucia F. title: Eat with Me
